azurerm_advanced_threat_protection.description: Manages a resources Advanced Threat Protection setting.

target_resource_id.description: The ID of the Azure Resource which to enable Advanced Threat Protection on. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

enabled.description: Should Advanced Threat Protection be enabled on this resource?

id.description: The ID of the Advanced Threat Protection resource.

create.description: Used when creating the Advanced Threat Protection.

update.description: Used when updating the Advanced Threat Protection.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Advanced Threat Protection.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Advanced Threat Protection.
